message:
من فضلكم اقتراح لكتاب بيتكلم عن ال Web Devlopment عامة يفهمك من أول ال Protocols يعني ايه HTTP وكده ميكونش مركز على technology 
وياريت لو كتاب حديث

data.message:
Web dev without referring to one specific technology is too vast a subject to be properly contained in one book (that I know of). However, I recommend something like "Computer Networking: A Top Down Approach"* for network protocols/HTTP/etc. 

*http://www.amazon.com/Computer-Networking-Top-Down-Approach-Edition/dp/0132856204

ده كتاب What every Web Developer should know about HTTP 
http://www.amazon.com/Developer-Should-OdeToCode-Programming-Series-ebook/dp/B0076Z6VMI

انا كنت حابه اشارككم بالكتاب اللي لقيته انا بس خايفه يكون outdated 
https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/1545691.Web_Application_Architecture

High performance browser networking

Buy / read online free:
http://chimera.labs.oreilly.com/books/1230000000545

Another link (download free)
https://www.nginx.com/http2-ebook/

Covers all the way to HTTP 2.

After understanding http, it might be important to have a look at http2 as well. Daniel Stenberg* wrote a nice introduction material for https: https://daniel.haxx.se/http2/

* Stenberg works on Mozilla firefox and is part of the IETF working group which is involved in writing http2 protocol. He wrote curl as well.
اعتقد إنك بالطريقة دي محتاج حاجة من قبيل Network Fundamentals زي اللي كنا بندرسها في ال CIW

the best introduction to web fundamentals for me was learning Java servlet development, it will teach you the ins and the outs of web servers and how requests are handled. Although the technology is old, it will allow you to see what happens behind the scenes
